member.name: D3D11_BUFFER_UAV
member.summary: Describes the elements in a buffer to use in a unordered-access view.

member.name: D3D11_BUFFER_UAV.FirstElement
member.summary: The zero-based index of the first element to be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_BUFFER_UAV.NumElements
member.summary: The number of elements in the resource. For structured buffers, this is the number of structures in the buffer.
